welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Markham, the charming city known for its rich history and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

restaurants.name: Angelica's Bakery
restaurants.description: Angelica's Bakery is a bakery located in Hazel Crest.

restaurants.name: Denver's
restaurants.description: Denver's is a diner located in Posen.

restaurants.name: Gum Wah Restaurant
restaurants.description: Gum Wah Restaurant is a chinese restaurant located in Midlothian.

restaurants.name: A P Deli III
restaurants.description: A P Deli III is a american restaurant located in Harvey.

restaurants.name: The Submarine Port
restaurants.description: The Submarine Port is a sandwich spot located in Midlothian.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport serves both domestic and international flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for Southwest Airlines flights and includes a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves a mix of airlines and features a variety of amenities, including a children's play area and charging stations.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is mainly used for Delta and Porter Airlines flights and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gary/Chicago International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all commercial flights and provides various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network throughout the terminals.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines, Air Canada, and others.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Alaska Airlines, and others.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
